definition: early or late/priority/in succession/one after another

sentences.english: But there are discrepancies in the timeline.
sentences.chinese: 但是在有關的時間先後問題上存在不一致的地方。

sentences.english: Since its founding, has received more than 400 foreign students trained people.
sentences.chinese: 建校以來，先後接受培養了外國留學生400餘人。

sentences.english: Wang Shunsheng and his visiting members visited several water conservancy project sites to learn about the progress of the on-going construction.
sentences.chinese: 王順生一行先後去到多個水利工程現場瞭解建設情況。

sentences.english: Gatsby and I in turn leaned down and took the small reluctant hand.
sentences.chinese: 蓋茨比和我先後彎下腰來，握一握不情願的小手。

sentences.english: She continued on to Riyadh and Jeddah in Saudi Arabia.
sentences.chinese: 接着，她先後訪問了沙特阿拉伯的利雅得和吉達。

sentences.english: He went on to win 12 medals in four Paralympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 此後，他先後參加了四屆殘奧會，贏得了12枚獎牌。

sentences.english: With the completion of a thermal power plant and a gas works in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 另有一座熱電廠和煤氣廠也即將先後建成。

sentences.english: But the lottery of friendship could even depend on who we happen to meet first.
sentences.chinese: 但這種緣分甚至可能還取決於相識的先後順序。

sentences.english: Strong visited China six times, all during the critical period of China's revolution.
sentences.chinese: 斯特朗先後六次訪華，全部是在中國革命的關鍵時刻。

sentences.english: Ruled at various times by Turkey and Austria, Banja Luka became part of Yugoslavia after World War I.
sentences.chinese: 不同時期曾先後由土耳其和奧地利統治。

sentences.english: Prof Deng obtained his MA and PhD degrees in Accounting from Xiamen University.
sentences.chinese: 鄧教授先後於廈門大學會計系獲得其碩士及博士學位。

sentences.english: You know the right order, and if you do it in batches it saves time.
sentences.chinese: 你知道做事的先後順序，分批次操作會節省時間。

sentences.english: She transferred and moved her personal belongings to six different store locations.
sentences.chinese: 她先後搬遷個人財物到六個不同的工作場所。

sentences.english: Just 20 days naokou side has seven people dead.
sentences.chinese: 短短二十幾天智子身邊先後死去七個人。

sentences.english: Start by thinking about what are the sequences.
sentences.chinese: 啓動的時候應該考慮下先後順序。
各種各樣的喇叭褲先後出現。

definition: to part or leave each other/to distinguish/difference/in different ways/differently/separately or individually
around/from beginning to end/all around/front and rear
to toss about in bed/from person to person/indirectly/to wander
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
